headline: Western Digital (WDC) Valuation Check As Analyst Upgrades And AI Storage Optimism Drive Earnings Expectations
summary: Western Digital (WDC) has been in focus as several analysts reaffirmed positive views and raised expectations ahead of upcoming earnings, citing AI infrastructure demand, NAND flash tightness, and the company’s push into advanced storage technologies. See our latest analysis for Western Digital. Western Digital’s recent moves around AI infrastructure and its upcoming Innovation Day arrive after a sharp run in the stock, with a 30 day share price return of 23.13% and a 90 day share price...

headline: Bank of America resets WDC price target
summary: Western Digital Corporation shares traded higher intraday on Tuesday, Jan. 20, as Bank of America reset its price target for the data storage solutions provider. The price change comes ahead of WDC's second-quarter 2026 earnings report, due after the market close on Thursday, January 29. One of the ...

headline: AI Storage Optimism and Innovation Day Buzz Could Be A Game Changer For Western Digital (WDC)
summary: In recent days, several research firms have reiterated positive views on Western Digital while updating their assessments of its prospects ahead of upcoming earnings and an Innovation Day event in New York. Together with expectations around AI-driven data storage demand and investments in advanced nanofabrication, these developments highlight how Western Digital is positioning itself within data center infrastructure. We’ll now examine how the upbeat analyst sentiment around AI-focused...
